name: github-original-streak
description: Get back longest and current streak on Github prifiles

scripts.clean: find build -regextype posix-egrep -regex ".*\.(zip|xpi|nex)$" -type f -delete && rmdir build
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.package: mkdir -p build && cd ./firefox && jpm xpi && mv *.xpi ../build && cd .. && zip -r ./build/chrome.zip ./chrome && cd ./build && cp chrome.zip chrome.nex

author: Naramsim
